text: 🇺🇦💣 Russia-Ukraine war: who will finance Ukraine's defense? 🤔💡 Nato's Jens Stoltenberg proposed a 5-year, 100bn euro package of military aid to Ukraine. 🇺🇸💪🚨 Ukraine's President Zelenskiy warned that without US military aid, they "will lose the war". 💔💰 Another $14bn will be allocated to the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative. 💸🤝 It's time for the international community to step up and support Ukraine in their fight against Russian aggression. 🇺🇦✊
